note: I believe in a federated UK like Canada or Australia. Old bloke living literally on the border between Wales and England. Centre left politics, member (since age 71) of Liberal Democrat UK party. Life in telecoms and computing. Now driving an EV and loving it. Support united Ireland but nobody seems to be working on it . Neutral on Scottish independence but nobody knows how it would be achieved and think Scots being used in the same way as Brexiteers used all of us
